fields.name: Tapo WIFI Smart Bulb
fields.description:
Compatibility - Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant for Voice Control, 
        Multicolour - With a wide range of colours and dimming capabilities,
        you can choose from multiple colours and set the mood to match any moment,
        Remote Access - Control your lights from anywhere with your smartphone using the free Tapo app,
        Device Sharing - Share management permissions with family members
        for multiple control,
        Schedules and Timers - Set schedules / timers to
        switch on and off automatically when youâ€™ re home or away.
